EmailTemplate.name: VNS_FusionePCR Integration with VisiCAD.Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Using Fusion ePCR with VisiCAD
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Using Fusion ePCR with VisiCAD
Fusion ePCR is a pre-hospital EMS incident documentation and data integration system that will provide patient caregivers with the electronic means to streamline the collection of pre-hospital EMS incident data both in the field and in the office. The system produces a complete, accurate, and legible electronic patient care record, thereby reducing liability as well as improving the quality of patient care and reimbursement.
Join Charlie Barry, Sr. Product Manager for Fusion ePCR, for an informational webinar on using Fusion ePCR with VisiCAD. In this webinar you'll discover:
Why Fusion ePCR was selected as a JEMS Hot Product The benefits and features of Fusion ePCR The data elements being transferred from Fusion ePCR to VisiCAD The Fusion ePCR / VisiCAD integration in action
If you are unable to view the "Register Now" button above, copy and paste the URL into your internet browser: http://offers.tritech.com/VNS_FusionePCRIntegrationwithVisiCAD_Registration.html
DATE: Wednesday, October 26
TIME: 10 AM Pacific l 11 AM Mountain l Noon Central l 1 PM Eastern
PRESENTER: TriTech's Charlie Barry, Sr. Product Manager of Fusion ePCR
Questions? Jenny Clavero in TriTech Marketing (858) 799-7362 jenny.clavero@tritech.com
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121 l PH: 858.799.7000
